Title: Object: Les Israélites sortant d'Egypte
Series: Recueil d'estampes d'après les plus beaux tableaux et d'après les plus beaux desseins qui sont en France
Series: Recueil Crozat
Series: Cabinet Crozat
Description: The Hebrews leaving Egypt, after a painting attributed to Veronese: classical setting with at centre a man carrying a heavy bundle and a woman leaving a house and walking down some stairs, at left more figures following them. c.1729/42 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From 'Cabinet Crozat' set, see 1907,1121.14 for comment. The painting is in the Musée des Beaux-Arts, Caen. The attribution to Veronese is debated, and it has been suggested the painting could be the work of the artist's studio, or Benedetto Caliari. See Pignatti & Pedrocco, 'Veronese', Milan 1995, cat. No.A 10, p.506
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (15)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
